description: ORDER AND OPINION RULING ON REPORT AND RECOMMENDATION:  After a thorough review  of the Report and Recommendation and the record in this case, the Court adopts  the Report (DE  30 ) and incorporates it here by reference.  It is, therefore, ORDERED that Plaintiff's claims are dismissed without leave for further amendment.  Signed by Honorable Joseph Dawson, III on 3/12/2025. (prou, )
